title: Is championship riven still coming?
body: I heard that championship riven was going to be available around the time of worlds with updated visuals. If patch 6.18 is the worlds patch then is this still true?

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find any timeline on her re-release outside of sometime around worlds. I recommend keeping an eye on the [News Page](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) for the official announcement.
 
Let me know if you have any questions.
